ch.unige.ng.timer.conditions
Interface Condition

All Known Implementing Classes:
AndCondition, EndCondition, EquationCondition, FirstCondition, FrequencyBiasedCondition, FrequencyCondition, StableFitnessCondition
public interface Condition

This interface defines a condition. To know if an event or a log has to be called, a condition is tested. If a condition is fired, then the event or the log is fired.

Version:
11 janv. 2005
Author:
Jacques Fontignie
